detail_desc: Ankle-length suit trousers in airy linen with a hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Short top with a small stand-up collar, a deep opening at the front, an opening at the back with press-studs at the back of the neck, and long sleeves.
3/4-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads with an interactive motif on the front.
Treggings in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly with a decorative button and front and back pockets.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with uneven, raw-edge hems.
Imitation leather sandals. Straps with adjustable fasteners and soft, moulded rubber soles.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft, patterned viscose jersey with smocking at the top and short sleeves with flounced trims.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey. Round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim and dropped shoulders.

Long-sleeved hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with embroidered text on the front, a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Twill trousers with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and slim legs with stripes down the sides.
Velour ankle-length trousers in a straight fit with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back, side pockets, a fake fly and tapered legs.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a regular waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.

Track jacket in heavy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring and plastic cord stopper. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, discreet side pockets, ribbing at the cuffs, and narrow elastication at the back of the hem. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, deep V-neck and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Calf-length dress in a soft viscose weave with a stand-up collar and concealed zip and buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, a flounced seam at the hips and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with a print motif, narrow shoulder straps and a racer back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide, cropped jersey T-shirt with a print motif on the front.
ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Blouse in airy viscose with short cap sleeves, a frilled collar, an opening at the top with ties and a rounded hem.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of trousers with straps in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a ribbed collar, and press-studs at the top and crotch. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist and straps that cross at the back with adjustable buttoning.

Bras in microfibre with mesh details and underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable, hole-patterned shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a tie detail at the hem.
V-neck strappy top in ribbed jersey with buttons down the front.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a turtle neck and long raglan sleeves.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in a soft organic cotton textured knit with buttons down the front.
Calf-length skirt in airy, pleated chiffon with a high, elasticated waist. Lined.
Ankle socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a foldover embroidered shaft.

Non-wired bra in an airy silk blend with lace sections. Lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.

Rain coat in water-repellent functional fabric with a drawstring hood, press-studs down the front and side pockets. Long raglan sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined. The coat can be folded and packed easily into the drawstring storage bag it is supplied with. Size of bag 9x21 cm. The coat has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front, yoke at the back, chest pocket and rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Calf-length, V-neck dress with a sewn-in wrapover at the front to create a draped effect. Short, wide, softly draping sleeves, a seam at the waist and a skirt with a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Visible seam that runs down the full length of the back. Unlined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft, matt finish. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, a stand-up collar, and a zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening down the front and a chin guard at the top. Drawstring at the waist, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, decorative satin ties at the sides and a half-string back.
Cycling shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in patterned, thermal fleece with a stand-up collar and zip with a chin guard at the front.
Long-sleeved shirt with an easy-iron finish, turn-down collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck, gathered seam at the front and long sleeves.
Glittery ballet pumps with a decorative bow at the front, elastic strap over the foot and grosgrain trim around the top. Satin insoles.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.

Studio Collection. Eye-catching, oversized jacket in shimmering metallic leather with a pointed collar in a contrasting colour and contrasting colour details on the sleeves and at the back. Concealed press-studs down the front, a yoke at the front and seams at the back with loose edges. Flap chest pockets, diagonal welt front pockets, dropped shoulders and longer sleeves with a long opening and concealed press-studs at the cuffs. Unlined. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with lace-trimmed hems. High, frill-trimmed, elasticated waist with a tasselled drawstring.
Fitted top in jersey with a low-cut back and long sleeves.
5-pocket trousers in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button (press-stud for sizes 2-8Y). Regular fit.
T-shirt in jersey with a motif.
Long-sleeved top in jacquard-patterned jersey with a slightly wider neckline and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made from recycled polyester, and chunky soles.

Wide tunic in pattern-weave cotton with a small stand-up collar, opening at the front and ties at the top. Dropped shoulders and long wide sleeves with narrow buttoned cuffs. Tiers and a flounce at the hem.
Pull-on trousers in a patterned viscose weave with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with elasticated hems.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Dress in a patterned organic silk weave with gathers around the neckline with narrow ties and an opening at the top with partially covered buttons. Long sleeves with a slit and wide cuffs with a covered button. Gathers with a draped effect at the waist, a seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt that drapes gently to the hem. Concealed zip in one side, a high slit at the front and an asymmetric hem. Longer at the back. Lined.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with an interactive appliqué on the front and jersey-lined, wrapover hood. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Alice band with soft faux fur ears, and a decoration in the shape of a padded unicorn horn with tulle.
Classic jacket in woven fabric with a chest pocket and flap front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Straight-style, short-sleeved top in an airy rib knit with decorative plastic beads on the shoulders and sleeves.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder (no press-studs in sizes 1-4Y).
Shorts in a cotton weave with smocking at the front of the waist and elastication at the back. Sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Padded parka in woven fabric. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a pile-lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zipped chest pocket, side pockets with a press-stud, a loose yoke at the back with a press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and imitation leather details. Slightly longer at the back with a single back vent. Quilted inner lining.
Knee-length shorts in a soft cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket with a button.
V-neck T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Trainers in mesh with with imitation leather details, a rubber print and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles. Height of soles 2.5 cm.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom on top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with narrow, braided shoulder straps and elastication at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and 3/4-length, wide legs.
Short-sleeved blouse in satin with a V-neck with ties at the top, short, wide sleeves, and a rounded hem.
High-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, two back pockets and skinny legs.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh racer back and elasticated hem. Lined at the front.
Small backpack with metal details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable shoulder straps. Size 11x21x26 cm.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a lace yoke, buttons and gathers at the top and elasticated cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back.
Sports jacket in soft fleece with contrasting colour trims and panels. Mesh-lined hood, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and zipped, mesh-lined front pockets.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, ribbed turtleneck, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, straight dress in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, ribbed trim around the neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
